frontmatter.title: Fusion SDS
frontmatter.description: IBM Fusion software provides resilient data services, wherever Red Hat OpenShift runs.

internal.content:
---
title: Fusion SDS
description: IBM Fusion software provides resilient data services, wherever Red Hat OpenShift runs.
---

import { DataProcessing, HybridCloud_02, StorageForResiliency } from '@carbon/pictograms-react';

<PageDescription>

Consistent data services wherever OpenShift runs - public cloud, bare metal, Z, Power, or vmware.

</PageDescription>

<Tabs>

<Tab label="Overview">

<PageDescription>

Protect your workloads with enterprise-grade data services.

</PageDescription>


<Row className="square-card-group">
  <SquareCard
    title="All of the storage your applications need"
    href="/"
    bodyText="Highly available block, file, and object storage - consistently, wherever OpenShift runs."
    >
    <HybridCloud_02 aria-label="Hybrid cloud storage" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Application resiliency"
    href="/"
    bodyText="Protect applications from data loss or corruption with enterprise grade backup/restore."
    >
    <StorageForResiliency aria-label="Resiliency" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Disaster recovery"
    href="/"
    bodyText="Protect applications from the loss of an availability zone or region with metro and regional disaster recovery."
     >
     <DataProcessing aria-label="Replication" className="my-custom-class" />
    </SquareCard>
</Row>

</Tab>

<Tab label="Resources">

Placeholder 2

</Tab>

<Tab label="FAQs">

Placeholder 3

</Tab>


</Tabs>

---
title: Fusion SDS
description: IBM Fusion software provides resilient data services, wherever Red Hat OpenShift runs.
---

import { DataProcessing, HybridCloud_02, StorageForResiliency } from '@carbon/pictograms-react';

<PageDescription>

Consistent data services wherever OpenShift runs - public cloud, bare metal, Z, Power, or vmware.

</PageDescription>

<Tabs>

<Tab label="Overview">

<PageDescription>

Protect your workloads with enterprise-grade data services.

</PageDescription>


<Row className="square-card-group">
  <SquareCard
    title="All of the storage your applications need"
    href="/"
    bodyText="Highly available block, file, and object storage - consistently, wherever OpenShift runs."
    >
    <HybridCloud_02 aria-label="Hybrid cloud storage" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Application resiliency"
    href="/"
    bodyText="Protect applications from data loss or corruption with enterprise grade backup/restore."
    >
    <StorageForResiliency aria-label="Resiliency" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Disaster recovery"
    href="/"
    bodyText="Protect applications from the loss of an availability zone or region with metro and regional disaster recovery."
     >
     <DataProcessing aria-label="Replication" className="my-custom-class" />
    </SquareCard>
</Row>

</Tab>
